      • quaternionFromEulerAngles

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Quaternion quaternionFromEulerAngles​(QuaternionUtil.EulerAngles angles)
        Create a quaternion from Euler angles.
        Parameters:
        angles - Angles in radians
        Returns:
        Generated Quaternion

      • quaternionFromEulerAngles

        public static org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Quaternion quaternionFromEulerAngles​(double alpha,
                                                                                    double beta,
                                                                                    double gamma)
        Create a quaternion from Euler angles. (ZXY) This function uses an algorithm from Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conversion_between_quaternions_and_Euler_angles#Euler_Angles_to_Quaternion_Conversion
        Parameters:
        alpha - Alpha / Yaw / Z angle (radians)
        beta - Beta / Pitch / X angle (radians)
        gamma - Gamma / Roll / Y angle (radians)
        Returns:
        Generated Quaternion

      • eulerAnglesFromQuaternion

        public static QuaternionUtil.EulerAngles eulerAnglesFromQuaternion​(org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Quaternion q)
        Get a quaternion as Euler angles. This implementation is based on: http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/geometry/rotations/conversions/quaternionToEuler/
        Parameters:
        q - Quaternion
        Returns:
        Euler angles in radians

      • rotateVectorByQuaternion

        public static org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix rotateVectorByQuaternion​(org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix vec,
                                                                    org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Quaternion q)
        Create a new vector that is the result of a vector times a quaternion. This is a direct translation of the operator* function from Unity's Quaternion class.
        Parameters:
        vec - A vector
        q - A quaternion
        Returns:
        A rotated version of the vector
